text: allah variki ela sanmargam cupagaladu? E jativaraite, visvasam pondina taruvata - mariyu niscayanga sandesaharudu satyavantude, ani saksyamiccina taruvata mariyu vari vaddaku spastamaina sucanalu vaccina taruvata kuda - satyatiraskaram avalambincaro! Mariyu allah durmargulaina variki sanmargam cupadu
